= Award =

This report provides the entry names and finishing places by group.  This can be very useful for personnel assigned to hand-out awards.

[http://bout-time.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/sample/reports/AwardReport.pdf Award report]

= Award Inventory =

This report provides the number of awards that are needed for the tournament.  This can be very useful for ordering awards.

[http://bout-time.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/sample/reports/AwardInventoryReport.pdf Award Inventory report]

= Mat Key =

This report provides a color-based mapping of the groups and the mats they are assigned to.  This can be very useful when needing to quickly identify what mat a group is assigned to.  

[http://bout-time.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/sample/reports/MatKeyReport.pdf Mat Key report]

= Bout Sequence Report =

This report provides a team's entries and their bout numbers for the entire tournament. Each line of the bout sequence report is a condensed representation of a bracket. Every possible win-loss scenario for an entry is captured in this report. See [HowToReadBoutSequenceReport this] for an explanation of how to read and understand this report.

[http://bout-time.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/sample/reports/BoutSequenceReport.pdf Bout Sequence report]
